response.overview: Why do people yearn for Tibet? What's there and how do people live there?  In August 2013, 10 people, 8 MINIs, 5 lines, 70,000 kilometers, starting from the Sichuan-Tibet line, Qinghai-Tibet line, Xinjiang-Tibet line, Yunnan-Tibet line, and Himalaya line to Tibet. The Tibet complex has been brewing for generations. With a production cycle of more than half a year and five groups of people spending one month on-site shooting, the original production team of "Urban Micro Travel" presents you with the purest, simplest and most simple experience that you have never seen before with the most sincere attitude. I have seen Tibet.
response.title: Into Tibet
